results.name: Column 1 of A102054, the matrix inverse of A060083 (Euler polynomials).
comment: 1-a(n+1) equals the n-th partial sum of the Genocchi numbers (A001469).
formula: This sequence's twin numbers are given in A133135. - _Paul Curtz_, Aug 07 2008
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 28 2004
